catalog.name: Temperature
catalog.description:
This collection contains the temperature map at 2 m s.l.t./s.l.m.. expressed in 째C calculated as an average over the period 2015-2019.
This information derives from processing conducted at an hourly and spatial time step of 1.4 km, using the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF)

members.name: Temperature
members.description: This collection contains the temperature map at 2 m s.l.t./s.l.m. expressed in 째C calculated as an average over the period 2015-2019.

members.name: Temperature at 2 m s.l.t./s.l.m.
